name: Unprepared
description:
Delve into the spiders' liar without any gear. Where you return from each defeat with the tool needed to succeed that challenge.

CONTROLS:

wsad/arrows: move, enter/space: confirm, R:reset the current level

HOW TO PLAY:

Navigate the floor to the white staircase. 

When you get killed you start the level over but with a tool for that obstacle. For example getting killed by an enemy respawns you with a sword.

18 floors in total.
